text:
Hi everyone,
Is there a document where I can see the list of variables that can be used in the membership_login_page template? Currently this is their example on the boilerplate:
```{% member_login 'my_login'
          email_label= 'Email',
          password_label= 'Password',
          remember_me_label= 'Remember Me',
          reset_password_text= 'Forgot your password?',
          submit_button_text= 'Login'
        %}```
I want to add a password confirmation but I canâ€™t find a documentation in HubSpot.. Any help would be appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:
